title: FingeRate Metaverse
description: FingeRate is the very first metaverse platform with actual utility in the real world. It offers revolutionary research & survey experiences with so much fun and plentiful rewards!
keywords: metaverse, app, nft, blockchain, sot, survey, vr ,ar

features: The real world mapped on metaverse!
SoT Research Asset located in famous landmarks around the world!
Enjoy more fun & convenient research and surveys through SoT!
From research data collection to data sales, SoT will be booming your profits!

content.h2: Let's get to know about SoT (Satisfaction of Things)
content.p: SoT (Satisfaction of Things) is a research & survey device in FingeRate metaverse that maps the real world. Each SoT is installed at intervals of 300m~500m.
ol: Survey requesters can run a survey on any SoT device they want, and the survey participants will be rewarded for participating in the survey.
Users can participate in surveys through SoTs available at their current location
Survey participants will be rewarded with SoM (SoT mileage) after completing the survey. SoM can be used to upgrade your avatar or purchase various items & services from the Marketplace.

slides.title: Anyone can purchase their desired SoT easily and conveniently
Survey request from a third party, such as an individual or company/institution
Conduct survey by GG56 or SoT owner her/himself
Earn rewards for participating in various surveys/researches
Statistical data available after completion of survey
Securing and utilizing statistical data from surveys on SoT
Selling data collected/processed from surveys on SoT
Satisfaction of Things, a win-win for everyone!

content.disclaimer: Special discount for bundle orders of 10 or more SoT!! Contact us for more details

box1.title: SIGNIS World Congress - A festival of the Catholics from all over the world at FingeRate!
box1.p: Through this MOU, GG56 Korea will provide technical support for the construction of a metaverse platform for the 2022 Seoul SIGNIS World Congress, which will be held from August 16 to 22 under the theme of “Peace in the Digital World.”
